title: zeixs - new designbooks need input
content:
about zeixs «

zeixs - portal for designers world - created by Feierabend Publishing and 12ender agency.  
what is zeixs? zeixs is an inseminatting confusion of differently media.Typography, Illustration, Graphic Design, Logotype  
just as much as Industrial Design and Photography constitute zeixs.

how does zeixs work? Show us your work - we´ll show it to the world.

what does zeixs stand for? far away from mainstream. Latest project are four books. Topic: Typography, Logotype, Graphic Design  
and Illustration. If you think that your work deserve beeing published utilize zeixs.  
See more information on [www.zeixs.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013091134/http:/www.zeixs.com/ "www.zeixs.com")  
Would be nice if you could forward this link.  
We need input as much as possible.  
Thanks a lot.

c h r i s t i a n k r ü g e r

12ender gmbh / agency for communication & design

lichtstrasse 46 / 508025 cologne / germany/ tel: +49 (221) 912 494 - 12 fax: -13
